name: Agentic Python Development Environment
postCreateCommand: uv pip install fastapi uvicorn httpx pydantic pydantic-ai openai anthropic
uv pip install asyncio aiohttp websockets
uv pip install pytest pytest-asyncio pytest-cov ruff mypy black isort
mkdir -p src/agents src/agui src/mcp src/api tests
touch src/__init__.py src/agents/__init__.py src/agui/__init__.py src/mcp/__init__.py src/api/__init__.py

cat > src/main.py << 'EOF'
from fastapi import FastAPI
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware

app = FastAPI(title="Agentic Python Server", version="1.0.0")

app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=["*"],
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)

@app.get("/")
async def root():
    return {"message": "Agentic Python Server is running", "status": "ready"}

@app.get("/health")
async def health():
    return {"status": "healthy", "service": "agentic-python"}

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)
EOF

cat > pyproject.toml << 'EOF'
[project]
name = "agentic-python"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Agentic Python Development Environment"
requires-python = ">=3.12"
dependencies = [
    "fastapi>=0.104.0",
    "uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0",
    "httpx>=0.25.0",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "pydantic-ai>=0.0.1",
    "openai>=1.0.0",
    "anthropic>=0.8.0",
    "asyncio-mqtt>=0.13.0",
    "websockets>=12.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.4.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0",
    "ruff>=0.8.0",
    "mypy>=1.7.0",
    "black>=23.0.0",
    "isort>=5.12.0",
]

[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=61.0", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 88
target-version = "py312"
select = ["E", "F", "I", "N", "UP", "B", "A", "C4", "T20"]

[tool.mypy]
strict = true
python_version = "3.12"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
addopts = "-ra -q --strict-markers --cov=src"
testpaths = ["tests"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
EOF
uv sync --dev || echo 'Warning: uv sync failed, continuing with pip install'
postStartCommand: echo 'ğŸš€ Start FastAPI server: uv run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000'
echo 'ğŸ§ª Run tests: uv run pytest'
echo 'ğŸ” Check code: uv run ruff check && uv run mypy src/'
postAttachCommand: echo 'Welcome to Agentic Python DevPod! ğŸ¤–ğŸ Ready for AI agent development.'
